m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen fuel cars are on the market | Examiner.com
m_szDocSumamry: Hydrogen fuel cars are on the market Use your key for the next article Hydrogen Fuel cell schematic US Department of Energy Alternative Fuels Data Center Hydrogen powered cars, called fuel cell electric vehicles (FCEVs), are already on the market. But the hydrogen infrastructure to fuel them is still in the early stages of deployment. Fuel cell electric vehicles (FCEVs) are powered by hydrogen and have the potential to completely revolutionize our entire transportation system. FCEVs are more efficient than conventional internal combustion engine vehicles and they produce no harmful tailpipe ex
